Pareidolia makes all cards face cards, Smiley Face adds +5 Mult for played face cards, Photograph doubles the Mult of the *first* face card, and Hanging Chad retriggers the first card an additional two times. The Stuntman (Holo) gives a +10 Mult, which is critical.

I've checked the Joker order and it's optimal: Smiley before Photograph. It *must* go this way, as Smiley before Photo maximizes the mult. Stuntman's chip bonus adds to the hand score, and the +10 mult from the Holo edition triggers after the standard Joker abilities but before the edition.

My refined calculation is: base 45 chips + 250 (Stuntman), then add the 3 of Diamonds Foil for 53 chips each time. # Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.

#Task
Analyze the total game state and context above, and respond with the appropriate action to take next."}
reasoning:
**Ante 8 Decision: Celestial Pack Buy**

Okay, here's the deal. Ante 8, final ante! Time to focus. This High Card build has been working well, but it's the end game, and the boss blinds can be brutal. Let's make sure I'm doing everything right.

Currently, I have $57. The hand is High Card, level 5. I've got a solid Joker setup with Smiley Face, Photograph, Hanging Chad, Stuntman, and Pareidolia. This gives me a good multiplier engine; Pareidolia turns everything into faces, ensuring maximum benefit from Smiley Face and Photograph. Stuntman is my chip powerhouse, and Hanging Chad helps retrigger.

Looking at the shop, *Ice Cream* is a potential chip boost, but Stuntman covers that. *Midas Mask* generates money but scoring is more crucial now. *The Magician* could be useful, but is inconsistent. *Sly Joker* is useless. I need scoring.

The *Standard Pack* might give me a good card but the *Celestial Pack* is what I *need*. Because of the Telescope voucher, I *know* it will contain Pluto. This will level up my High Card and get me more chips and multi. I can't leave this to chance. *Tarot Merchant* is an option, but the current build is very consistent.

So, I need to get that Celestial Pack. It's position 2 in the booster section of the shop. I have the money.

The only consumable I have is "The World," which changes cards to spades. Not useful at all for High Card, so no need to sell it.

The JSON is straightforward: I need to output `{"action": "buy_booster", "positions": [2]}` to get the pack.

Double checking, the Celestial Pack is in the correct position. Yes. And that's what I want.

So, here it is:

`{"action": "buy_booster", "positions": [2]}`
